name: Space War (itch) (sat7ag)
description:
Hello friends!!

This game takes us into the  Space where you have to destroy all enemy spaceships and free the space from enemies.

Modifications:-

  • Changed the background in each level.
  • Important feature:-  As you proceed in the game i.e as time passes, your firerate decreases i.e the rate at which you fire bullets decreases, making it difficult for you to kill the enemies.
  • Big enemies are added . The firerate  of enemies varies throughout the game (sometimes it is low ,sometimes it is high).
  • Changed the UI and the enemies attack from different places.
  • Changed the music for each level and the name of game on menu.
  • Added asteroids which can harm you  if you touch them.

Please review it and sorry if game size is large, it is due to the backgrounds that i added , next time i will take care of it. Your suggestions are always welcomed :)

Thank you,

Credits:

Created by Satyam Agarwal
